metadata.title: CVE-2017-15194 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
include/global_session.php in Cacti 1.1.25 has XSS related to (1) the URIor (2) the refresh page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15194` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.38+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.38+ds1-1').
